member.name: SYNCMGRSTATUS
member.summary: Used in the method to specify the updated status for the item.

member.name: SYNCMGRSTATUS.SYNCMGRSTATUS_SKIPPED
member.summary: Indicates that this item should be skipped.

member.name: SYNCMGRSTATUS.SYNCMGRSTATUS_PENDING
member.summary: Synchronization for the item is pending.

member.name: SYNCMGRSTATUS.SYNCMGRSTATUS_UPDATING
member.summary: The item is currently being synchronized.

member.name: SYNCMGRSTATUS.SYNCMGRSTATUS_SUCCEEDED
member.summary: The synchronization for the item succeeded.

member.name: SYNCMGRSTATUS.SYNCMGRSTATUS_RESUMING
member.summary: Synchronization for the item is resuming.

member.name: SYNCMGRSTATUS.SYNCMGRSTATUS_UPDATING_INDETERMINATE
member.summary: Windows Vista and later. Shows marquee progress for the synchronized item. Sets the progress bar in the folder to marquee the synchronization progress.

member.name: SYNCMGRSTATUS.SYNCMGRSTATUS_DELETED
member.summary: The item has been deleted. This value has been deprecated for Windows Vista and later.
